heading.name: Aggregated No Assigned Primary
heading.definition: # of active patients without an assigned primary
heading.notes: i) # of active patients without an assigned primary ii) # all active patients for all providers

indicatorQuery.query: SELECT SUM(fin.NO_ASSIGNED_PRIMARY) AS "Number Active, No Assigned Primary", SUM(fin.OTHER_PATIENTS) AS "Number Active, Assigned Primary" FROM ( SELECT IF( d.provider_no IS NULL OR d.provider_no = '' OR p.provider_no IS NULL ,1 ,0 ) AS NO_ASSIGNED_PRIMARY, IF( d.provider_no IS NOT NULL AND d.provider_no != '' AND p.provider_no is NOT NULL,1 ,0 ) AS OTHER_PATIENTS FROM demographic d LEFT JOIN provider p ON d.provider_no = p.provider_no WHERE d.patient_status LIKE ${pstatus} ) fin;

drillDownQuery.query: SELECT fin.* FROM ( SELECT IF( d.provider_no IS NULL OR d.provider_no = '' OR p.provider_no IS NULL ,1 ,0 ) AS NO_ASSIGNED_PRIMARY, IF( true, 1, 0 ) AS ALLACTIVE FROM demographic d LEFT JOIN provider p ON d.provider_no = p.provider_no WHERE d.patient_status LIKE ${pstatus} ) fin;
